sitename: Stewart Family Chiropractic, Riverdale, NJ - Chiropractic Care for Infants to Seniors
cleaned_text: The NVIC is known as America's Vaccine Safety Watchdog. BEFORE vaccinating your children, please follow this link to their website and get the information you need to make an informed vaccination decision. This website is also a great resource if your child has had a unwanted reaction to a vaccine. [Click Here](http://www.nvic.org/) to visit the NVIC website.
